Gasoline Grill Review | Bon Appetit









































Close Menu IconLoginRecipesCookingCultureShoppingRestaurantsBA MarketVideosPodcastSubscribe to our newsletterSign UpPrivacy and user agreementMain Navigation IconBA LogoBon appetitLogincopenhagenGasoline GrillDon’t be fooled by the gas pumps—this mini chain serves Copenhagen's greatest burgerFacebookPinterestTwitterEmailPhoto by Ditte IsagerGO HERE: for the city’s best organic burgers and crinkle-cut fries. It won’t seem revolutionary to most Americans, but wow, is it good. (Those potato rolls!)ORDER THE: butterburger, herb oil for fries, and chocolate mousse for dessert. The original location near Gothersgade is cooler, but the Indre By location doesn’t sell out as quickly.THE VIBE IS: truly a gas station with a bright-green neon sign and actual pumps. There is some outdoor seating.PRACTICAL STUFF: Open every day, 11 a.m. until sold out. Take advantage of your jet lag and go as early as you can: They usually sell out by 5 p.m. Check its Instagram page beforehand to make sure they’re still stocked.—Christine MuhlkePhoto by Ditte IsagerPhoto by Ditte IsagerWE ALSO LOVESlurp Ramen JointObsessively, meticulously made ramen that’s got people lining up in Indre ByApollo Bar & KantineLook at contemporary art, eat some stellar bread at this Indre By hot spotDen VandretteGet your L’Anglore fix at this sunny Indre By wine barExplore City GuidesAtlantaAustinBostonCharlestonChicagoCopenhagenLas VegasLondonLos AngelesMexico CityMiamiMontrealNew OrleansNew YorkParisPhiladelphiaPortlandSan FranciscoSeattleTokyoTorontoVancouverWashington, D.C.GET THE MAGAZINEBA LogoBon appetitSUBSCRIBESign up for Updates on the Bon AppétitCity GuidesSign UpWill be used in accordance with our user agreement and privacy policyBA LogoBon appetitSubscription FAQsMastheadNewsletter SignupAccessibility HelpRSS FeedsSite MapCondé Nast StoreCareersBon Appétit Media KitDo Not Sell My Personal InformationCondé NastFood Innovation Group: Bon Appétit and Epicurious© 2022 Condé Nast.
